channel.title: Last-Xile | Frostiescape Reborn | Camelot PvP | Old times
channel.description:
[center][img]http://last-xile.com/public/style_images/4_Untitled.png[/img]
I started with phanes base and client This base gave me so much trouble but i stuck through it to the end.
[b]Last-Xile is a server, that only i am working on. This was a past project but i just never bothered to complete it because Frostiescape was still up.
The economy will be very strong and that will effect the game play. Last-Xile will consist of enjoyable content and stable and fair gameplay.
There are a lot of pk servers out there. What make's Last-xile So diffrent you ask? Well to start off it has a great eco. Items and cash are not so easily obtainable.
This server is pk and eco based. You will be allowed to do pure at most, but the rest you are on your own. The Combat on this server is fairly good.
I have implemented my own combat method which is not that bad.[/b]
[URL=http://"http://last-xile.com/index.php/pages/download"][img]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_wPEYt539Qgo/THsjCb4836I/AAAAAAAACK0/3QVyBJA87cI/s320/PlayNowButton2.2.bmp[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://last-xile.com/index.php/pages/webclient"][img]http://medicaladvices.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/gfr-download-300x133.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[Center] [SIZE=5]9/20/13[/SIZE] * Downloaded Phanes Client/Base * Changed home to camelot * Added npc's * Added banks * Dialogues added * Vesta's/Statius/Dragon Claw added * Special for claw/vesta/statius added * Anims and Gfx added. * Combat was fixed up. * Fixed Object on dialogue * Added better block emotes * Working altars(dialogued) * Experiments added * Credit system added. * Training Dialogue Finished
[SIZE=5]9/21/13[/SIZE] * Perfect Prayer * Old School Prayer * Reset Npc * All Shops finsihed * Dialogues done
[SIZE=5]9/23/13[/SIZE] * Added Highscores * Cache Packing Interfaces * Flawless Combat * Fixed a lot of dupes * Highscore now loads 4 diffrent Score Boards * Npc Stat Reset * Thieveing Added 3k/6k/9k/24k * Donator Crowns Added
[SIZE=5]9/25/13[/SIZE] * Added better combat * 2 starters per ip * Fixed Background problem * Fixed Webclient issue * Fixed more dupes,exploits * Fixed adding interface issue * Better Screen rotation(smoother) * Purchased vps * Purchased domain * Purchased web hosting * Better Shops [/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb428/Mamyte1/combat-3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://images-mediawiki-sites.thefullwiki.org/00/3/2/0/67408362280023065.png[/img]
Attack Styles Flawless Combat All Special Formulas Perfect Switching Correct attack styles configured for each weapon Special Attacks Special attacks have correct GFX and animations Real refilling time Level Requirments for Weapons and Armor Correct Max Hit Formula Accuracy is based upon bonuses, attack style, levels, bonuses, pots No standing on eachother , Attacker must walk [Poisoning Poison starts high and slowly looses power Correct armor effects Correct Void Effects
[IMG]http://images-mediawiki-sites.thefullwiki.org/09/2/7/1/464298510729961.png[/img] Level Requirments Accuracy is correct Special bows added correctly (Dark Bow) Correct Ammo and Out of Ammo Checks All Special Attacks Clipped Ranging Poisoning works Bows Knives Darts
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130330044951/runescape/images/f/f7/Magic.png[/img]
Perfect Modern Magics Perfect Ancient Magics Perfect Lunar Magic Bonuses effect accuracy Correct times for freezing/binding spells
[IMG]http://www.global-rs.com/img/prayer.gif[/img] Proper Draining Bone on ground Bone on alter All prayers work Piety
[/center]
[CENTER] [SIZE=4]Pictures:[/SIZE]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ChcZaiL.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2zfS32X.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5IKpabK.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KXGiWs8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MIHatMy.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TpfScM2.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oHloYbn.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4HsFSou.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/b8fBxpK.png[/img]
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/8876/2qef.png[/img]
[img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/3838/o2ek.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pFBFavp.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sZXZpED.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/c4YPaKC.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Combat Media:[/SIZE]
[img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/3112/8dvb.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oY0yfWJ.png[/img]

item.title: Last-Xile | Frostiescape Reborn | Camelot PvP | Old times
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Ahhhh, Camelotpvp was among my most favorite RSPS memories The super over-powered dds, terrible combat, good times. This base is obviously different than my aforementioned comments haha, no hate intended. Good luck man!

Read full topic

item.title: Last-Xile | Frostiescape Reborn | Camelot PvP | Old times

item.description:
@DdsSpecz wrote:

[center]

I started with phanes base and client
This base gave me so much trouble but i stuck through it to the end.

[b]Last-Xile is a server, that only i am working on. This was a past project but i just never bothered to complete it because Frostiescape was still up.

The economy will be very strong and that will effect the game play. Last-Xile will consist of enjoyable content and stable and fair gameplay.

There are a lot of pk servers out there. What make’s Last-xile So diffrent you ask? Well to start off it has a great eco. Items and cash are not so easily
obtainable.

This server is pk and eco based. You will be allowed to do pure at most, but the rest you are on your own. The Combat on this server is fairly good.

I have implemented my own combat method which is not that bad.[/b]

[/center]

[Center]
[SIZE=5]9/20/13[/SIZE]

  • Downloaded Phanes Client/Base
  • Changed home to camelot
  • Added npc’s
  • Added banks
  • Dialogues added
  • Vesta’s/Statius/Dragon Claw added
  • Special for claw/vesta/statius added
  • Anims and Gfx added.
  • Combat was fixed up.
  • Fixed Object on dialogue
  • Added better block emotes
  • Working altars(dialogued)
  • Experiments added
  • Credit system added.
  • Training Dialogue Finished

  • Old School Prayer
  • Reset Npc
  • All Shops finsihed

  • Cache Packing Interfaces

  • Highscore now loads 4 diffrent Score Boards
  • Npc Stat Reset

  • Donator Crowns Added

[SIZE=5]9/25/13[/SIZE]

  • Added better combat
  • 2 starters per ip
  • Fixed Background problem
  • Fixed Webclient issue
  • Fixed more dupes,exploits
  • Fixed adding interface issue
  • Better Screen rotation(smoother)
  • Purchased vps
  • Purchased domain
  • Purchased web hosting
  • Better Shops
    [/CENTER]

[CENTER]

Attack Styles
Flawless Combat
All Special Formulas
Perfect Switching
Correct attack styles configured for each weapon
Special Attacks
Special attacks have correct GFX and animations
Real refilling time
Level Requirments for Weapons and Armor
Correct Max Hit Formula
Accuracy is based upon bonuses, attack style, levels, bonuses, pots
No standing on eachother , Attacker must walk
[Poisoning
Poison starts high and slowly looses power
Correct armor effects
Correct Void Effects

Accuracy is correct
